Package business.entities.character.mage

Class Mage

java.lang.Object
business.entities.character.Character
business.entities.character.mage.Mage
public class Mage extends Character
Class that represents a Mage, extends from Character.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • canEvolve

      public boolean canEvolve()
      The Mage class can't evolve.
      Specified by:
      canEvolve in class Character
      Returns:
      Always returns false for a Mage character.

    • evolve

      public Character evolve()
      The Mage class can't evolve.
      Specified by:
      evolve in class Character
      Returns:
      The Mage character itself since it cannot evolve.

    • isAreaAttack

      public boolean isAreaAttack(boolean fireball)
      Determines if the battle action is an area attack.
      Overrides:
      isAreaAttack in class Character
      Parameters:
      fireball - true if the battle action is Fireball, false if it is Arcane missile.
      Returns:
      true if the battle action is an area attack, false otherwise.

    • doBattleAction

      Performs the battle action for the Mage character.
      Specified by:
      doBattleAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - The Dice object used for performing the action.
      fireball - true if the battle action is Fireball, false if it is Arcane missile.
      Returns:
      The damage dealt by the battle action.
